segments.text: I'm sorry , I'm afraid you've dialed the wrong number . There is no Petti here .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Wrong number ? Are you sure ? I called yesterday and she was there .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I'm sure you have the wrong number . This one has been my number for more than 20 years .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: That's impossible . I remember the number clearly . Isn't this 763-4565 ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: No , It isn't . It's 736-4565 . It seems you've misdialed .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Really ? I ' m so sorry I bothered you . I ' ll try again .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: That's all right . This sort of thing happens all the time to everyone .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yeah . I guess it does . Sorry again for bothering you .
segments.speaker: S2
